title: Erkenbrand's Horn (O) (18O6)
text:
Set:	Treachery & Deceit
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Rohan
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Possession
Game Text:	Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. Fellowship: Exert bearer to play a follower from your draw deck. Reshuffle your draw deck. Skirmish: Discard a follower from play to make bearer strength +4 (if bearer is Erkenbrand, he is strength +5 instead).
Rarity:	O
Notes:	Legends Masterworks Series. Scan courtesy of Shieldmaiden.
